roleset.name: disagree
roleset.note: DISAGREE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disagree' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from disagree.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: disagree-v: intransitive
example.text: Mr. Icahn advocates the sale of the company's steel operations, and Mr. Corry doesn't necessarily disagree.

example.name: disagree-v: topic as sentence
example.text: Thomas M. Bloch, president and chief operating officer, says ``I would disagree'' that the tax business is mature.

example.name: disagree-v: topic as nominal
example.text: The appeals court disagreed on both counts.

example.name: disagree-v: introduced by different preposition
example.text: A spokesman for Dow Jones said he hadn't seen the group's filing, but added, ``obviously Dow Jones disagrees with their conclusions.

example.name: disagree-v: merged arguers
example.text: John and Mary disagreed about the cause of his noxious foot odor.
example.arg: about the cause of his noxious foot odor

example.name: disagree-v: I can't believe this hasn't occurred yet
example.text: John disagreed with Mary about the cause of his noxious foot odor.
example.arg: about the cause of his noxious foot odor
